oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Wide band planar modified triangular monopole antennas
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: RAY, KP
KUMAR, G
ANOB, PV
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: impedance characteristics
planar monopole antenna
triangular monopole
modified triangular monopole
orthogonal triangular monopole
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Various new configurations of planar triangular monopole antennas have been investigated. Effect of flaring angle of planar triangular monopole antennas on the bandwidth has been studied. A compact configuration of vertex chopped equilateral triangular monopole antenna has been proposed for ultra wide bandwidth ratio of 9.2:1. Orthogonal vertex chopped equilateral triangular monopole antenna is proposed for obtaining the improved azimuthal onmidirectional radiation pattern. (c) 2007 .
